definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.chinese: 这个视频只有2000的浏览量。

sentences.english: Anyone want to defend the pageview?
sentences.chinese: 有人要为页面浏览量辩护吗？

sentences.english: Velasquez's TED Talk has millions of views.
sentences.chinese: 维拉斯克兹的TED演讲拥有好几百万的浏览量。

sentences.english: Why I like the network is that they have a base pay and a certain dollar amount for pageviews.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这个网络因为他们有底薪，还按浏览量算钱。

sentences.english: You also need lots of page views and a high click-through rate.
sentences.chinese: 您还需要大量的页面浏览量和高点击率。

sentences.english: Statistics like reads, visits, pageviews, most read topic etc.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢阅读统计，参观，综合浏览量，最阅读等话题。

definition: number of clicks/number of hits (on a website)
Zhihu, Chinese Q&A website modeled on Quora, at zhihu.com, launched in Jan 2011
to reply to an invitation/(Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic
cotyledon of a bean (i.e. either of the halves of a bean seed that can be split apart after removing the seed coat)/thick bean sauce (abbr. for 豆瓣醬|豆瓣酱[dou4 ban4 jiang4])
"zombie fans", fake followers that can be bought to boost one's popularity on Weibo, Baidu etc
talk (loanword)/chatline of PRC Internet company Taobao, taokshop.com
